website_summaries.verdict: As seen on Shark Tank, this beard bib is designed to keep beard hair off your counters, sinks, floors, and clothes. And it does the job, for the most part.
pros: Catches beard and other hair trimmings for simple disposal
Attach neck straps and secure to mirror with the suction cups
Can serve as a dopp bag for other grooming accessories
Catch the majority of hair clippings and save cleaning time
cons: Catches a lot of hair, but not all of it
Hair can stick to the fabric, making it difficult to empty
